alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:18PM MDT until July 08 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GUADALUPE COUNTY... At 318 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Puerto De Luna, or near Santa Rosa, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Puerto De Luna and Cuervo. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 273 and 294. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
